#!/bin/bash

#credential for profitbricks.com user="vadym.shpen@starwind.com" pass="${pfbpass}" d=`(date +%F)`

curl --include \ --request POST \ --user "$user:${pfbpass}" \ --header "Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded" \ --data-urlencode "name=DE-SVN-SYS-$d" \ https://api.profitbricks.com/cloudapi/v3/datacenters/090db2df-0beb-4cca-8827-228f293ee5c2/volumes/a86f674d-a44a-4e87-ad23-2dc301d23af2/create-snapshot
